TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 HTTP 请求查询字符串字段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request query-string field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类作为的一部分传递的 HTTP 请求查询字符串到使用的参数在参数化的查询或命令中的字段的值绑定。You can use the class to bind the value of a field that is passed as part of an HTTP request query string to a parameter that is used in a parameterized query or command. 该字段检索从集合。The field is retrieved from the collection. 将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常，如果引用对象，但没有相应的查询字符串名称/值对传递。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is referenced, but no corresponding query-string name/value pair is passed. 同样，它们可能会显示任何数据，如果查询字符串字段名称传递不带相应值。Similarly, they might display no data if the query-string field name is passed without a corresponding value. 若要避免这种情况下，设置属性在适当的位置。To avoid these situations, set the property where appropriate. 类提供了属性，用于标识要绑定到的查询字符串值的名称。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the query string value to bind to. 它还提供的属性的继承自类。It also provides the properties that are inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不会验证传递的值; 它提供了原始值。The class does not validate the value that is passed; it provides the raw value. 但是，可以验证的值数据源控件中的对象。However, you can validate the value of a object in a data source control. 若要执行此操作，处理`Selecting`， `Updating`， `Inserting`，或`Deleting`事件数据的源控件，并检查事件处理程序中的参数值。To do so, handle the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event of the data source control and check the parameter value in the event handler. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以取消数据操作，通过设置关联的属性类到`true`。If the value of the parameter does not pass the validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建要用作筛选器时显示中的数据对象控件。The following example shows how to create a object to use as a filter when you display data in a control. 您将添加对象传递给控件的集合。You add the object to the control's collection. 参数对象将名为的查询字符串字段的值绑定`country`到其字符串。The parameter object binds the value of the query-string field named `country` to its string. 因为没有属性指定为参数，如果没有字段命名为`country`使用查询字符串传递控件将引发异常。Because no property is specified for the parameter, if no field named `country` is passed with the query string, the control throws a exception. 如果一个名为`country`传递，但没有值，控件未显示任何数据。If a field named `country` is passed but has no value, the control displays no data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/CS/qsp4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_4/VB/qsp4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建对象来显示使用参数化的 SQL 查询从 Access 数据库的数据。The following example shows how to create a object to display data from an Access database by using a parameterized SQL query. 对象中检索记录，然后显示在控件。The object retrieves records that are then displayed in a control. 控件也是可编辑，并允许用户更新 Northwind Traders Orders 表中的订单的状态。The control is also editable, and lets users update the status of orders in the Northwind Traders Orders table. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的未命名新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象，它通过创建构造函数初始化它的所有属性的默认值。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 初始化属性，如下所示：The properties are initialized as follows: - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为空字符串 ("")。 is initialized to an empty string (""). - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 。 is initialized to . - 初始化为 `null`。 is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数创建一个新参数并将其添加到的集合控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to create a new parameter and add it to the collection of an control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 对象添加到控件，并在 ASP.NET 网页中声明。The object is added to the control and is declared in an ASP.NET Web page. 控件使用控件将绑定和显示数据，页面请求包含查询字符串，其中包含名为一个字段时`empId`并具有相应的值。The control uses the control to bind and display data whenever the page is requested with a query string that contains a field that is named `empId` and that has a corresponding value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是用于克隆的受保护的复制构造函数实例。The constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a instance. 值， ，和属性传输到新实例。The values of the , , and properties are transferred to the new instance.

The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 使用指定的字符串来标识要绑定到的查询字符串字段，初始化 类的新命名实例。

span.span: Initializes a new named instance of the class, using the specified string to identify which query-string field to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象，它通过创建构造函数初始化具有指定的参数名称用于标识此参数绑定到的查询字符串字段。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和具有默认值初始化属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建两个通过使用对象构造函数并将其添加到控件的集合。The following example shows how to create two objects by using the constructor and add them to an control's collection. 一个控件显示数据，如果`employee`和`country`与请求一起传递查询字符串字段，并且如果具有有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/CS/qsp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_2/VB/qsp2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new named and strongly typed instance of the class, using the specified string to identify which query-string field to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象，它通过创建构造函数初始化使用指定的参数名称、 参数类型和用于标识此参数绑定到的查询字符串字段的字符串。A object that is created by using the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, the parameter type, and a string that identifies the query-string field that the parameter binds to. 和具有默认值初始化属性。The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建通过使用对象构造函数并将其添加到控件的集合。The following example shows how to create a object by using the constructor and add it to an control's collection. 一个控件显示数据，如果`employee`和`country`与请求一起传递查询字符串字段，并且如果具有有效的值。A control displays data if the `employee` and `country` query-string fields are passed with the request and if they have valid values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/CS/qsp3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_3/VB/qsp3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override object Evaluate (System.Web.HttpContext context, System.Web.UI.Control control);

span.span: The current instance of the request.

param.name: control

span.span: A Web server control that is associated with the ASP.NET Web page where the object is used.
**Note** This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 更新并返回 对象的值。

span.span: Updates and returns the value of the object.

returns.span: 表示参数当前值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the current value of the parameter.

returns.span: 如果上下文或请求为 ， 方法将返回 。

span.span: If the context or the request is , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将尝试将每次都绑定到查询字符串字段的调用方法。The object tries to bind to the query-string field every time that the method is called. `context`参数由方法来检索查询字符串中指定的查询字符串字段的值。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified query-string field from the query string. `control`参数将被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryStringField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 参数所绑定的查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the query-string field that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识使用查询字符串传递的名称/值对。The property identifies a name/value pair that is passed with the query string. 属性标识该对的名称，而属性在运行时绑定到其对应值。The property identifies the name of the pair, whereas the property binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果预期的查询字符串名称/值对不传递到查询字符串，包含的页方法会尝试将该参数绑定到的值属性。If the expected query-string name/value pair is not passed to the page with the query string, the method then tries to bind the parameter to the value of the property. 如果未设置属性，方法无法将参数绑定到一个值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象一起控件来显示中的数据控件。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 属性设置为预期的查询字符串字段的名称和参数添加到集合。The property is set to the name of the expected query-string field, and the parameter is added to the collection. 一个以防使用查询字符串不传递的名称/值对提供属性。A property is provided in case the name/value pair is not passed with the query string. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/CS/querystrparam1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_1/VB/querystrparam1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用对象一起控件来显示中的数据控件。The following example shows how to use a object together with a control to display data in a control. 对象添加到集合，以及其他用于输出参数和返回值的参数对象。The object is added to the collection, together with other parameter objects that are used for the output parameter and return value. 若要检索的数据，处理从存储过程返回的值。To retrieve data, handle the values that are returned from the stored procedure. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateInput { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateInput : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置是否验证查询字符串参数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the value of the query string parameter is being validated or not.

value.span: 如果查询参数的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the query parameter is being validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页面属性设置为`true`，并属性设置为`false`，将不会验证查询字符串参数。If the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will not be validated. 但是，如果页属性设置为`true`，并属性设置为`true`，将验证查询字符串参数。However, if the page property is set to `true`, and the property is set to `true`, the query string parameter will be validated. 如果页面属性设置为`false`，而不管是否将验证查询字符串参数属性设置为`true`或`false`。If the page property is set to `false`, the query string parameter will be validated regardless of whether the property is set to `true` or `false`.
